titleStmt.title: To the churches of Jesus throughout the world. Gathered and setled in His eternal light, power, and lpirit [sic], to be one holy flock, family, and houshould to the Lord, who hath redeemed them from among all the kindreds of the earth.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
